annual.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: The school trip has become an annual event.
annual.translation[0].definitions[1].def: based on or calculated over a period of one year
annual.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: a household with an annual income of $60,000
annual.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a plant that lives for one year or season
annual.translation[1].definitions[1].def: a book, especially for children, that is produced once a year with the same title but different stories, pictures etc
annual.translation[2].definitions[0].def: annual events happen once a year
annual.translation[2].definitions[0].exa: Shareholders can vote at the annual meeting.
annual.translation[2].definitions[1].def: calculated over a period of a year
